settings: manual control and various automatic settings (video modeburst shooting, etc.)
sensor_size: 23.5mm x 15.6mm [APS-C] X-Trans CMOS III with primary color filter
ISO: up to 12800 ISO with little noise

preset_modes: 27 preset modes (e.g. soft skin, fireworks, snow)

color: silver, pink, black, red, or purple
effects: 15 photo effects (skin softening, big eyes, small face, etc.)
long_exposure: up to 30 minutes with bulb mode
